name: Invasion (itch) (AppleFruitGames)
description:
Invasion is a game made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. The game is a first person shooter where you have a multi-purpose weapon. You can grapple to different places in the forest and shoot aliens. However, the aliens have a special power - they can merge together to become stronger.

When aliens merge they gain their health back so try to stop them!
